description: Coined by Johann Eduard Erdmann as New Latin Panlogismus in Die Entwicklung der deutschen Speculation seit Kant.  Ultimately from Ancient Greek παν- (pan-) +‎ λόγος (lógos) +‎ -ισμός (-ismós), equivalent to pan- +‎ Logos +‎ -ism.

entries.meaning: (philosophy) The Hegelian doctrine that the universe is the act or realization of Logos, and therefore logic and ontology are the same study.
